channel.title: Looking for a good developer
channel.description:
I am seeking a friend and a developer to work on my current project that I have released to the public.
I have lisenced VB. and know stuff about rsps coding.
The thing's ive managed at the moment.
Extremely stable - no lag Perfected clipping systems. We offer realistic safe spots and no monster will every walk through a tree! A large and friendly player community Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations Stable economy Challenging experience rate - not too fast or too slow Challenge many bosses and obtain rewards - GWD as the ultimate challenge Several minigames, including duel arena, barrows, fight pits, fight caves and pest control! All skills working perfected. 525 GameFrame with Orbs Mage Following Range Following Clipped Projectiles Clipped Following Clipped Npcs Reworked Defence Formulas - pvp Reworked Attack Formulas - Both pvp and pvm Amazing Switching
Prayer Correct Drops PvP Point System PvP Point Shops Pest Control Barrows Great Dagganoth Caves Slayer Skill with Slayer Gem Working Ice Queen Lair Chaos Elemental King Black Dragon Tzhaar Cave Correct Demon Models All Doors Working All Ladders Working New Friends & Ignore Lists All doors work!
There's 2 error's client bat flood's with a error but works.. and sometimes when you weild a item the client crash's.
Mail me for my info and we can get started!

item.title: Looking for a good developer
item.dc:creator: @General_Z General Z
item.description:
@General_Z wrote:

add me on skype: areyou.mad
ill show u my work

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a good developer
item.dc:creator: @Andy1993 Andy1993
item.description:
@Andy1993 wrote:

Sorry… I dont normaly use mopar, I dont normaly use any of these site’s unless im stuck and need help…

I would like to say If you would like to work on a project with me, contact me on here via the message button and I will give you my Skype. I dont want to post on here so anyone can just add me.

Thanks, and sorry for bad posting.
I dont think I should make a little form as it’s not a job, if you can supply me with details… then I’m more than happy to consider you, I cant post picture’s at the moment as im on the wrong pc. I’m layed in bed on my laptop and my PC with the files and images are on there.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a good developer
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This uh, isn’t really how we do development teams. We don’t “mail you” information. Usually you’d want to put pictures and such up to show off your server, and then make an application section for members to apply, or you give them the information to contact you (aka skype). You didn’t supply an e-mail, which makes me question why you said “mail me” because the only option we technically have besides replying is private messaging.

Read full topic
